pricing_plans.name: Bronze Package
pricing_plans.includes: General admission to the concert or festival.
pricing_plans.additional_options: Food and beverage vouchers available for purchase.

pricing_plans.name: Silver Package
pricing_plans.includes: General admission, VIP seating, and access to exclusive backstage areas.
pricing_plans.additional_options: VIP catering and meet-and-greet with artists.

pricing_plans.name: Gold Package
pricing_plans.includes: VIP seating, backstage access, premium catering, and a commemorative gift.
pricing_plans.additional_options: Luxury transportation to the event and personal concierge service.

pricing_plans.name: Essential Package
pricing_plans.includes: Entrance to the themed party, costume rental, and access to themed activities.
pricing_plans.additional_options: Food and drink packages available for purchase.

pricing_plans.name: Premium Package
pricing_plans.includes: Entrance, costume rental, VIP lounge access, and premium themed activities.
pricing_plans.additional_options: Themed photo booth and personalized party favors.

pricing_plans.name: Deluxe Package
pricing_plans.includes: VIP entrance, costume rental, private VIP lounge, premium activities, and a dedicated host.

pricing_plans.name: Standard Admission
pricing_plans.includes: General admission to the art exhibition.
pricing_plans.additional_options: Guided tours and art catalog purchase.

pricing_plans.name: Art Enthusiast Package
pricing_plans.includes: Priority admission, guided tour, and a limited edition art print.

pricing_plans.name: Art Collector Experience
pricing_plans.includes: VIP admission, private curator-led tour, exclusive art piece, and champagne reception.

pricing_plans.name: Movie Buff Pass
pricing_plans.includes: General admission to the film screening.

pricing_plans.name: VIP Premiere Pass
pricing_plans.includes: VIP admission, red carpet experience, and access to the after-party.

pricing_plans.name: Director's Cut Experience
pricing_plans.includes: Director's cut screening, VIP lounge access, private filmmaker reception, and souvenir booklet.

pricing_plans.name: Spectator Pass
pricing_plans.includes: General admission to the sports event.

pricing_plans.name: Athlete Experience
pricing_plans.includes: VIP seating, athlete meet-and-greet, and access to exclusive athlete lounge.

pricing_plans.name: Ultimate Fan Package
pricing_plans.includes: VIP seating, athlete meet-and-greet, signed merchandise, and premium catering.

pricing_plans.name: Comedy Enthusiast
pricing_plans.includes: General admission to the standup comedy show.

pricing_plans.name: VIP Comedy Experience
pricing_plans.includes: VIP seating, meet-and-greet with comedians, and access to a private comedy lounge.

pricing_plans.name: Laugh-a-Lot Premium Package
pricing_plans.includes: Front-row VIP seating, backstage access, personalized comedy set, and gourmet dinner.
